thread.title: Trixy Elle (centre, L), and other survivors of super Typhoon Rai on Thursday called on British oil giant Shell to provide financial compensation for climate-related devastation
thread.title_full: Trixy Elle (centre, L), and other survivors of super Typhoon Rai on Thursday called on British oil giant Shell to provide financial compensation for climate-related devastation

author: Ted ALJIBE
title: Trixy Elle (centre, L), and other survivors of super Typhoon Rai on Thursday called on British oil giant Shell to provide financial compensation for climate-related devastation
text:
Trixy Elle (centre, L), and other survivors of super Typhoon Rai on Thursday called on British oil giant Shell to provide financial compensation for climate-related devastation Ted ALJIBE Dec 11, 2025 Dec 11, 2025 Updated 21 mins ago Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Trixy Elle (centre, L), and other survivors of super Typhoon Rai on Thursday called on British oil giant Shell to provide financial compensation for climate-related devastation Ted ALJIBE Tags Afp As featured on +2 Filipino typhoon survivors sue Shell over climate change Survivors of a deadly 2021 typhoon in the Philippines have filed a lawsuit against British oil giant Shell, seeking financial compensation for climate-related devastation, three NGOs supporting them said Thursday. Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save
+2 Filipino typhoon survivors sue Shell over climate change Survivors of a deadly 2021 typhoon in the Philippines have filed a lawsuit against British oil giant Shell, seeking financial compensation for climate-related devastation, three NGOs supporting them said Thursday.
